title: Security Badge Log
body: Badge swipes show entry at 9:12 PM and no exit.

title: Incident Report Draft
body: A draft report mentions 'missing inventory' and an 'unsecured door' noticed at 9:46 PM

title: Email Thread: Procurement
body: A chain about expedited orders and a 'do not ask questions' note.

title: CCTV Still Frame
body: Blurry still shows a silhouette near storage at ~9:30 PM.

title: Interview: 'I saw an open door and simply checked out what was going on'
body: Subject claims they were in the area and noticed an open door.

title: I swiped to get inside, write a report on it, and closed the open door on my way out.
